name: Deep down (Tend)
description:
Explore the sewers to find the ring you dropped, being careful not to get lost in the labyrinth of tunnels and passages that compose them. Hurry up, it's not a good idea to linger in this place too long. 
Since you are there, try to find all the 6 graffiti hidden in that place...

Controls: ActionKeysControllerMoveA-D/ arrow keysD-padQuick time eventA-W-S-D/ arrow keysX - Y -A -BJumpW / space / up AToggle walk/runLeft shift BEnter a door or interact with an objectEX

The controller is only partially supported

Credits:
  • coding, design: Tend 
  • art and animation: AliBi_196
  • music composition: Void
  • testing: Emanon - Democracy
  • first game completion: Cacciavento

  • fonts: BEBAS NEUE BOOK,  Nanum Pen Script
  • sound effects: ZapSplat
